name: Dash Racing
description:
Welcome racing driver!

Dash Racing is an arcade racing game, great for Kids and adults.

In this amazing 2D car game you drive your car on the highway obstacle course.

Look out for green areas as they will help you to continue the race by decreasing your race car speed.

Use your left and right arrows to control your race car.

In Dash Racing you can compete with others around the world in the Best Time Top and Best Speed Top Leader boards.

Challenge your friends through two major social networks and see who's the best race driver !

We really believe that Dash Racing is the best racing game out there.

Be Careful. This game tend to become a very addictive game :-)

Are you ready to become #1 ?! :-)

LABsterzz
